description: This table provides information on changes to specified no-add items in the order (ORD) master file formatted for the EHI export.

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the medication order (prescription) record. NOTE: This is an internal unique identifier for ORD master file records in this table and cannot be used to link to CLARITY_MEDICATION.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for each change.

columns.name: VALUE_LINE
columns.description: A value is needed. For multiple response item, it is the line number for each real data or 0 for total count line. For single response item, it is 1.

columns.name: OLD_VALUE_INTERNAL
columns.description: For audited items which store a networked record ID, this column will extract the CID of the linked record in OLD_VALUE. For other items this will extract the same value as OLD_VALUE.

columns.name: NEW_VALUE_INTERNAL
columns.description: For audited items which store a networked record ID, this column will extract the CID of the linked record in NEW_VALUE. For other items this will extract the same value as NEW_VALUE.

columns.name: OLD_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: The old value of the item in external format. Dates, categories, and networked items will display meaningful information instead of the internal value.

columns.name: NEW_VALUE_EXTERNAL
columns.description: The new value of the item in external format. Dates, categories, and networked items will display meaningful information instead of the internal value.

columns.name: CHANGED_DATA_ELEMENT
columns.description: The Clarity table and column which corresponds to the data which changed.

columns.name: CHANGE_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique user ID who made the change.
